text:
The optional PVCS  task in Ant uses an incorrect argument to the 'GET' PCLI
function. 

The command used is " GET -r<Label Name> ...."  while the correct command
argument should be " GET -v<label Name> ...."

incidentally the " -r" argument for the PCLI GET function is used to obtain a
particular revision.

Regards
Pradeep
